Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add memory-based workflow support and comprehensive optimizations

## Major Features
- Add toggle option (write_to_disk) to export nodes for direct memory passing
- Enable SplatTrainer_gsplat to accept both disk and memory dataset inputs
- Eliminate file I/O overhead in memory-based workflows

## Code Optimizations
- Create BaseDatasetExporter class to eliminate code duplication
- Refactor export nodes to use shared base class methods
- Simplify depth preparation with _prepare_depth helper
- Standardize error handling across export nodes

## Documentation & UX
- Add comprehensive tooltips to all node inputs explaining purpose and usage
- Add DESCRIPTION field to all node classes
- Update README with 5 complete workflow examples
- Add wiring best practices guide and compatibility matrix
- Document memory vs disk workflow trade-offs

## API Changes
- Export nodes now return (dataset_dir, dataset) or (dataset_dir, trajectory, dataset)
- SplatTrainer_gsplat accepts optional dataset_dir OR dataset parameter
- All changes maintain backward compatibility

## Input/Output Alignment
- Verified consistent data types across all nodes
- Standardized trajectory, dataset, and path passing conventions
- Fixed RETURN_TYPES inconsistency in Gen3CDiffusion (LATENTS -> LATENT)
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add 14 cinematic camera motion presets

## New Camera Presets
Added 9 new professional camera motion presets:
- dolly_out: Pull away from target (reveal context)
- truck_right: Lateral movement right-to-left
- crane_up/crane_down: Vertical lift/descent
- arc_left/arc_right: Partial orbit arcs (90° default)
- boom_shot: Combined dolly+crane with ease curves
- figure_eight: Lissajous figure-8 pattern
- hemisphere: Spherical orbit with elevation variation

## Total Presets: 14
1. orbit - Full circular motion
2. dolly_in - Push in toward target
3. dolly_out - Pull out from target ⭐ NEW
4. truck_left - Lateral left
5. truck_right - Lateral right ⭐ NEW
6. crane_up - Vertical lift ⭐ NEW
7. crane_down - Vertical descent ⭐ NEW
8. arc_left - Quarter-circle left ⭐ NEW
9. arc_right - Quarter-circle right ⭐ NEW
10. tilt - Vertical angle tilt
11. spiral - Helical inward/outward
12. boom_shot - Cinematic curved motion ⭐ NEW
13. figure_eight - Dynamic 8-pattern ⭐ NEW
14. hemisphere - Spherical coverage ⭐ NEW
15. custom - User keyframes

## Parameters Added
- crane_start_height/crane_end_height
- arc_degrees (15-180°, default 90°)
- boom_start/end_radius and height
- hemisphere_elevation (0-90°)

## Documentation
- Added comprehensive preset descriptions
- Quick reference table with use cases
- Parameter explanations for each preset
- Updated tooltips for all inputs

## Benefits
- Professional cinematic vocabulary
- Cover all standard camera movements
- Suitable for product shots, architecture, character reveals
- Easy-to-understand naming convention
EOF
